Welcome to Studio City Midrise in Studio City, California, where a local lifestyle meets a thriving community.
Dive into comfort, and convenience, and choose from our studio or one-bedroom apartment homes.
Discover an arrangement of personal, and community amenities, and embrace upgraded features and services.
Our prime location gives residents quick access to Highways 101, 134, and 170.
Enjoy many public transit options with our simple, and close proximity to Universal City Walk and subway stations.
Find yourself with plenty of space to call your own, and modern upgrades that will always make you feel right at home.
From stainless steel appliances to beautiful outdoor spaces, there are so many reasons to fall in love with our Studio City apartments.
Our management team is dedicated to bringing you an exceptional living experience, that is full of easier living.
Come home to Studio City Midrise today, and join our community.
